description.value: On a successful hit of an All Out Attack, can use Reaction to make another attack with the same bonuses/penalties as the original attack. Note using a reaction in this way means the character cannot Parry or Dodge until their next turn.

specialAbilities.name: Bonus Attack
specialAbilities.description: After successful All Out Attack, use Reaction to make another attack with same bonuses/penalties. You cannot Parry or Dodge until next turn.
